results.overview: A man is falsely convicted of the murder of his wife. During his time in jail, he finds comfort from four women with whom he corresponds. After his second court appearance, he is finally freed from prison only to be framed for yet 2 more murders which he did not commit. With the help of his former prison guard, he once again sets out to clear his name
results.title: Letters from a Killer

results.overview: When a group of old college friends reunite over a long weekend after one of them attempts suicide, old crushes and resentments shine light on their life decisions, and ultimately push friendships and relationships to the brink.
results.title: About Alex

results.original_title: A Guide to Becoming a Detective
results.overview: A smug detective introduces his clueless sidekick to the ropes of the trade, but is made to confront the reason he became a private eye in the first place – an elusive dream girl and her mysterious disappearance.
results.title: A Guide to Becoming a Detective

results.overview: After his happy life spins out of control, a preacher from Texas changes his name, goes to Louisiana and starts preaching on the radio.
results.title: The Apostle

results.overview: In a not-too-distant future, a lethal virus sweeps across Europe, prompting the creation of quarantine refugee camps in the United States. Police officers Delon (Natasha Henstridge) and Lemieux (Christopher Lambert) learn of a grisly murder in the Boston camp and team up to investigate. Suspecting the ruthless killer is infected with the virus, the pair have just hours to stop him before he becomes contagious and infects the entire population.
results.title: Adrenalin: Fear the Rush

results.overview: World premiere of the ultimate film about the ultimate pop band. On the 50th anniversary of their iconic urovision victory, this is the untold story of ABBA in the golden years between 1976 and 1980.
results.title: ABBA: Against the Odds

results.original_title: Yo soy así, Tita de Buenos Aires
results.overview: A portrait of the life of Tita Merello, famous Argentinian singer and actress.
results.title: I Tita, A Life of Tango

results.original_title: Der alte und der junge König
results.overview: The story of the stormy relationship between King Friedrich Wilhelm and his son, who later became known as King Frederick the Great of Prussia.
results.title: The Making of a King

results.original_title: Murder, She Baked: A Deadly Recipe
results.overview: Bakery owner Hannah Swensen just can't keep her hands out of the batter when murder stirs things up in Lake Eden, Minnesota, leaving the sheriff dead, a deputy accused, and a killer on the loose.
results.title: Murder, She Baked: A Deadly Recipe

results.overview: Working-class British housewife Myra Savage reinvents herself as a medium, holding seances in the sitting room of her home with the hidden assistance of her under-employed, asthmatic husband, Billy. In an attempt to enhance her credibility as a psychic, Myra hatches an elaborate, ill-conceived plot to kidnap a wealthy couple's young daughter so that she can then help the police "find" the missing girl.
results.title: Seance on a Wet Afternoon

results.overview: Old enemies stationed together at an Army post vie for the same woman.
results.title: Bugles in the Afternoon

results.overview: Le Clémenceau is a tobacconist's and PMU frequented by a popular clientele in Saint Raphaël. There are customers who are just passing through, and regulars who come to fill their loneliness. Many of them have been hurt by life, and see the bar as an anchor for their family. Some live on the streets, others have been in psychiatric hospitals, and most suffer from addiction. Conversations between customers and confidences follow one another as the days go by.
results.title: Au Clémenceau

results.overview: A talk show about today's significance of the radio derails after the hosts don't like what their guest has to offer.
results.title: Eingeengt & Angestrengt

results.overview: With this film (the second war trilogy set during the Filipino-American war in the early 1900s), the revolution marches on against the Americans after the bloody death of General Antonio Luna. The conflicted philosophies behind the heroic struggle continue and become personified in the colorful character of General Gregorio "Goyo" del Pilar.
results.title: Goyo: The Boy General

results.original_title: Werner Herzog and Errol Morris on 'The Act of Killing'
results.overview: Directors Errol Morris and Werner Herzog describe and discuss the film The Act of Killing (2012).
results.title: Werner Herzog and Errol Morris on 'The Act of Killing'

results.overview: The story of Lars "Faen" Andersen, the man who killed the most number of whales in history
results.title: A Devil with Harpoon

results.original_title: In Search of the Sanderson Sisters: A Hocus Pocus Hulaween Takeover
results.overview: "In Search of the Sanderson Sisters" is a hilarious mockumentary to benefit The New York Restoration Project, starring "Hocus Pocus's" Bette Midler, Kathy Najimy, and Sarah Jessica Parker.
results.title: In Search of the Sanderson Sisters: A Hocus Pocus Hulaween Takeover

results.original_title: It's All True - A Visual Album
results.overview: A visual album. A story of falling apart and putting yourself back together again as the world does the same. It is a story about personal death and rebirth, mental health, dealing with the tragedies of the world, queer love and finding community while featuring two of the most important places to the artist, MALINDA- Brooklyn and the west coast of Ireland.
results.title: It's All True - A Visual Album

results.overview: Three brothers living with their father fib and play pranks to win parental approval for themselves and their romances.
results.title: All's Well, Ends Well

results.overview: The wealthy Tombsthays hire a guitar tutor, David Aurphet, for their daughter Vivian. The wife, Julia, begins a passionate affair with David. Edwige, Julia's new neighbour, also takes an interest in David. David is attacked one night on returning home but saved by a mysterious stranger Daniel who reveals himself to be a hired killer. David begins to suspect that his affair is no longer secret.
results.title: Death in a French Garden
